author: Pink Fried Memes
comment: Fluid animation, oddly satisfying textures, nice colors. Although being able to customize those colors would gain a fifth star!

reply.author: Oleksandr Popov
reply.content: You can customize colors in phone app. In Android Wear app, tap on watch face to access settings screen.

title: Awsome

author: Dan P
comment: Full ambient mode and a date option would get a fifth star.
title: Great start

author: Ted Miller
comment: 3 stars because most are blurry (by design,  I  think). 5 stars for the ones that aren't. The red LCD with green bkgd is a frequent go-to watch face.
title: A mixed bag

author: Joshua S
comment: 1. Add an option to display the date. 2. Make the seconds smaller.
title: A few suggestions

author: Landon Hooser
comment: Probably one of the best watch faces in my opinion. Simple and a marvel to look at. Keep it up !!!
title: Amazing

author: Captain America
comment: I rated 2 because it cuts off on the top of my Moto 360 but the watch faces look really good
title: It's pretty good

author: Mitch L
comment: Please read the permissions before you download this app. It requires access to many things on your phone to work.
title: Read permissions before downloading
